item.title: Lower Cargo Compartment Fire Extinguisher System – Six Bottle System, Bottles C, D, E & F

remarks.para: All bottles and associated indications may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: For Combi, procedures are established and used to verify main deck cargo compartment remains empty or contains only empty cargo handling equipment, ballast (ballast may be loaded in ULD's), or fly away kits, and
Flight remains within 20 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Flight remains within 20 minutes of landing at a suitable airport.

placard.para: Placard adjacent or on fire control module located on pilots overhead panel "LOWER CARGO COMP FIRE EXT SYST INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
